r.d:
Documents: https://mdref.m6w6.name/pq
Highlights: * Nearly complete support for asynchronous usage: https://mdref.m6w6.name/pq/Connection/%3A%20Asynchronous%20Usage * Extended type support by pg_type: https://mdref.m6w6.name/pq/Types/%3A%20Overview * Fetching simple multi-dimensional array maps: https://mdref.m6w6.name/pq/Result/map * Working Gateway implementation: https://mdref.m6w6.name/pq-gateway
r.n: * Fix gh-issue #27: crash in pq\Connection::escapeBytea() + Update static pq\Types with PostgreSQL-10 types
